scripts.test:php:functional: export WP_TESTS_DIR=/tmp/wordpress-$npm_package_config_wp_version-tests-lib/ && export WP_CORE_DIR=/tmp/wordpress-$npm_package_config_wp_version/ && npm run install:wp --BWP_Framework:wp_version=$npm_package_config_wp_version && npm run test:php --BWP_Framework:phpunit_suite='functional'
scripts.test:php:stable: npm run test:php:unit && npm run test:php:functional:stable
scripts.test:php:all: npm run test:php:stable && npm run test:php:functional:3.7 && npm run test:php:functional:trunk
scripts.test: export WP_DB_USER=test && export WP_DB_PASS=test && npm run test:php:stable
scripts.build: export WP_DB_USER=root && export WP_DB_PASS=wordpress && npm run test:php:all
